msContents.summary: Tax register, recording the daily collection of money taxes in the village of Karanis; the name of each tax-payer paying the poll-tax is cross-referenced with a page of another register, where taxpayers were listed geographically

msItemStruct.note: Due to the size of this tax roll (P.Mich. IV/1, 225 + IV/2, 358), its content has been divided in the present database into several cards (one for each column).
Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank

div.ab: (Col.) 151;;(Epeiph 29, continued);;Herieus the elder, son of Horos and Thaesis, grandson of Pnepheros, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;Ninis, son of Asklas and Tabous, grandson of Ninis, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;Eutyches, slave of Sarapias, for ch(--): 28 obols;Sabinus, son of Ptolemaios and Zoidous, grandson of Ptolemaios: 4 drachmai;Sempronius, son of Ptolemaios and Nilous, grandson of Ptolemaios: 8 drachmai;Horos, son of Onnophris and Isidora, grandson of Harendotes, for ch(--): 8 drachmai;Sentis also called Theagenes, son of Petheus and Tauris, grandson of Theagenes: 16 drachmai; (and) for ch(--): 8 drachmai;Thenatymis, daughter of Sarabion - (through) Amikos - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 3 drachmai 1/2 obol; for olive (transportation), 2 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 11/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 5 obols; for eparourion, [2] drachmai 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 1 obol; for kollybos, 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi. Total: 7 drachmai. (In left margin:) 4 drachmai 27 obols.;Longinia Gemella - (through) Tientil - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, [10 drachmai]; for olive (transportation), 1 drachme 2 1/2 obols; for naubion, 1 drachme; for supplements, 2 drachmai 3 obols; for eparourion, 6 drachmai 4 obols; for supplements, [3] 1/2 obols; for kollybos, 2 obols 2 chalkoi. Total: 22 drachmai 3 obols 2 chalkoi.;(And) for a vineyard that was harvested, for year 13: for apomoira, 1 drachme 1 1/2 obols; for naubion, 1/2 obol; for supplements, 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for eparourion, 5 obols; for supplements, 1/2 obol; for kollybos, 1/2 obol. Total: 2 drachmai 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi.;(And) for another (vineyard) that was harvested, for year 13, in Pastiontis, (in the estate) of Anthos, (slave/freedman) of Germanicus Caesar: for apomoira, 2 drachmai 3 obols; for naubion, 1 1/2 obols; for supplements, 3 1/2 obols; for eparourion, 1 drachme 4 obols; for supplements, 1 obol; for kollybos, 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi. Total: 5 drachmai 1obol.;(And) for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14: 3 obols; for supplements: 1/2 obol; for kollybos: 2 chalkoi. Total: 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi.;(And) for the naubion of owners of private land, similarly: 2 drachmai 3 1/2 obols; for supplements: 3 obols 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 1/2 obol. Total: 3 drachmai 1 obol 2 chalkoi. ;(And) for the rent on sequestrated land (prosodikos phoros), for year 13: 20 drachmai; for supplements: 1 drachme 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. Total: 21 drachmai 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi.;And (for) Longinia Ptolemais: for the naubion [of owners of private land], for year 14: 1 <drachme> 2 obols; for supplements: 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 2 chalkoi. Total: 1 drachme 4 obols. (In left margin: 60 drachmai.);Pakysis, son of Onnophris and Soeris, grandson of Satabous: 8 drachmai;Pasion, son of Sambas and Aphrodite, grandson of [Phaesis]: 16 drachmai 16 obols
